hadith.text: Narrated Ali ibn AbuTalib: The tradition (No 5045, about Tasbih Fatimah) has been transmitted by Ali to the same effect through a different chain of narrators. This version adds: Ali said: I did not leave them (Tasbih Fatimah) since I heard them from the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) except on the night of Siffin, for I remembered them towards the end of the night and then I uttered them
